text: Hi, I am using CrmAssociationPivot component to display deal stages but it's showing "page refresh" as attached screen-print. Please guide me how to fix the issue. In error log also it's not showing anything.
Thanks <@U04EJHVD8FM> for your quick response. I included the "`HubSpot.extend(() => <Extension/>)`" but it's showing same error
does it work when running it locally?
I didn't setup locally, I uploaded to sandbox environment and test the functionality

I'd recommend testing it locally. It'll allow you to diagnose issues much quicker

`hs project dev` is the command you can run
I'd also recommend updating to the latest release of the CLI

Also, the crm data components aren’t yet available in the sidebar.

We are actively working on making each component available in the sidebar. We plan to have them available or a more targeted release timeframe by the end of Q4.
Ah yep that'll do it :point_up: , thanks <@U05ENUJF7B5>
Hey <@U05CAJG8D98> this not possible at the moment, but we are actively considering it, will keep everyone posted here when it's available. Thanks for bringing up the use case.
Hey Cristobal, thank you for bringing this up. we are looking into the fix internally.
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> I actually had a typo so I think that the "red increase arrow" only shows up when the value of the attribute is not set the right way
My only feedback is that, if the attribute is not correctly set it shouldn't show something confusing. I'd prefer that it shows an error.
